rows.Name: strVarName
rows.Comment:
Contains the name of the variable as used in the
CNC program in capital letters

rows.Name: pAdr
rows.Comment: Pointer to the variable with the namestVarName

rows.Name: eVarType
rows.Comment: Declares the type of the variable

rows.Name: diValue
rows.Comment:
DEPRECATED: This value is not used and does not have to be set
Value in integer representation

rows.Name: fValue
rows.Comment:
DEPRECATED: This value is not used and does not have to be set
Value in floating point representation
